com.hazelcast.config

Class EntryListenerConfig.MapListenerToEntryListenerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hazelcast.config.EntryListenerConfig.MapListenerToEntryListenerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntryListener, HazelcastInstanceAware, EntryAddedListener, EntryEvictedListener, EntryRemovedListener, EntryUpdatedListener, MapClearedListener, MapEvictedListener, MapListener, EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    EntryListenerConfig

    public static class EntryListenerConfig.MapListenerToEntryListenerAdapter
extends Object
implements EntryListener, HazelcastInstanceAware
    Wraps a MapListener into an EntryListener.
